definition: erhua variant of 對勁|对劲[dui4 jin4]
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
erhua variant of 不對勁|不对劲[bu4 dui4 jin4]

sentences.english: This hoe suits me very well .
sentences.chinese: 這把鋤我使着很對勁兒。

sentences.english: They have been getting along quite well.
It just seemed like things were off all day.
sentences.chinese: 好像整天都不太對勁兒。
你今天有點兒不太對勁兒啊。

sentences.english: I do feel a little delicate. Maybe I'm coming down with a cold.
sentences.chinese: 我是覺得身體不太對勁兒，恐怕是得感冒了。
